means: （起源于拉丁美洲的）康茄舞，康茄舞曲

sentence.Network_en: They understood the difficulty of stopping a rolling Conga line.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们知道要一条正在滚滚向前的“康加线”停下来是有困难的.

sentence.Network_en: Senorita, feel the conga, let me see you move like you come from Colombia.
sentence.Network_cn: 感觉到康茄舞的拍子, 让我看到你像哥伦比亚人一样的摇摆.

sentence.Network_en: It's called la conga which is one of the most popular dances in South America.
sentence.Network_cn: 这叫做康茄舞,这种舞是在南美洲最流行的一种.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 上面的是康加鼓(conga),演出时因为音色的需要,一般是两个在一起的.康加鼓跟非洲鼓有紧密的关系,但它实际来自古巴,在当今世界中是 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(29) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... confute 驳斥 conga 康茄舞 conge 撤职.
视听发烧网-器材论坛【音响器材的一些中英文对照】 ... cone loundspeaker 纸盆扬声器 conga 康茄鼓 connector 连接器、接插件.
Uploaded videos - YouTube ... Supremes Cha Cha 梦幻女郎 Conga 来跳康加舞 La Vie En Rose 幸福人生.

list.abs: 从蓝调到古典、从康加舞(congas)乐曲到俄罗斯民谣，每一首乐曲的旋律皆充满故事性，音乐张力十足，无须言辞点缀。

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: from Latin American Spanish, from Spanish, feminine of congo 'Congolese'

entry.def: If a group of people dance a conga, they dance in a long winding line, with each person holding on to the back of the person in front.

means.word_mean: 1. music composed for dancing the conga
2. a Latin American dance of 3 steps and a kick by people in single file

auth_sentence.res_content: Newmont said its Conga project in Peru would continue only on a measured basis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Newmont said its Conga project in Peru would continue only on a measured basis.

auth_sentence.content: Chances are they were both voted " most unlikely to instigate a conga on New Year's Eve" upon graduation from secondary school.
